str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To train, practice, exercise. Probably from the same as skeuos; to elaborate, i.e. train.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
(free from hurt or harm, hence) not offending, not causing offence, blameless. Passively, faultless, i.e. Not led into sin.
The conscience, a persisting notion. From a prolonged form of suneido; co-perception, i.e. Moral consciousness.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
